author: Shen Lu, for CNN
title: Chinese workers in the US are losing their visas with their jobs. But flying home is too expensive
description: After her company laid her off last month, Tang Chen couldn't sleep. For days, her heart kept racing. There was one question at the front of her mind: would she be able to stay in the United States?
content:
Boston, MA (CNN)After her company laid her off last month, Tang Chen couldn't sleep. For days, her heart kept racing. There was one question at the front of her mind: would she be able to stay in the United States?
